REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3338 reute w f BC-BERKEY-<BKY>-TO-DISTR 10-20 0051

TEXT.TITLE: BERKEY <BKY> TO DISTRIBUTE DISNEY HOME VIDEOS
TEXT.BODY: Berkey Inc said it signed a long-term agreement to distribute Walt Disney Co's <DIS> home video cassettes. Terms of the agreement were not disclosed. The Walt Disney library currently consists of 18 movies, the company said. Reuter
